title: Quell OCE is now recruiting
body:
Quell OCE is recruiting team players who can use their skills for the teams requirements.

If you wish to join Quell OCE, please fill out this form:

http://www.quell.site-au.com.au/contact-us.html

We will get back to you if you are what we are looking for.

replies.body: Praise the lord, Pumah's starting up another team. The glory days are upon us.

> [{quoted}](name=Dooly,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=UJZjhkoA,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-10-16T13:43:59.034+0000)

He is chalejour lvl. Nubcake team m8s holding the gr8 one bak.
this guy is a joke, his actual game knowledge is very lacking, a game doesn't revolve around one person, his knowledge of item builds all around are very silly.
